name: fender
content:
fender noun [C]
(FIRE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a low metal frame around an open fireplace that stops the coal or wood from falling out
Nuarevik/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

fender noun [C]
(WHEEL COVER)
US (UK wing) one of the four parts at the side of a car that go over the wheels: There's a dent in the left fender.
Ioannis Tsotras/Moment/GettyImages
US (UK mudguard) a curved piece of metal or plastic above the wheels of a bicycle or motorcycle that prevents dirt from getting on the rider
Science Photo Library/GettyImages
